title: Recruitment Executive
tagsAndSkills: Recruitment,Bulk hiring,IT Recruitment,End to end recruitment,Sourcing,Lateral hiring,Screening,IT Staffing
jobDescription:
Dear All,


We at CHANGE Networks are currently hiring for HR Executive role.


Job Description:


- Responsibilities for end-to-end recruitment for in-house requirements.
- Handling all the positions from Entry Level to Senior Level positions.
- Sourcing Candidates.
- Screening Candidates.
- Arranging Interviews.
- Coordinating Compensation Packages.
- Induction, On boarding Candidates and other related tasks.
- Providing analytical and well-documented recruitment reports.


Requirements:


- Excellent understanding of IT skills.
- Ability to dig deeper into sorting most suitable candidate
- Passionate and Career oriented candidate.
- Proactive with eye on details
- Skillful to read between the lines and smartly handle candidates and their queries
- Able to meet Company goals and objectives
- Ensure sufficient and timely staffing


If you feel you're fit for the role, send your resume to neha.shaikh@change-networks.com.

title: Critical Care Medicine - CCM
tagsAndSkills: Patient care,Critical care,Anesthesia,DNB,Critical Care Medicine,Ccm,Medicine
jobDescription:
Reliance Hospital is looking for Critical Care Medicine - CCM to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey
  • Patient Assessment:Perform comprehensive assessments of critically ill patients to determine medical conditions and treatment needs
  • Treatment Planning:Develop and implement individualized treatment plans for patients in the intensive care unit, addressing their specific medical needs
  • Ventilator Management:Manage and oversee mechanical ventilation for patients requiring respiratory support
  • Monitoring:Utilize advanced monitoring equipment to assess patients' vital signs and respond promptly to changes in their condition
  • Diagnostic Procedures:Perform and interpret diagnostic procedures, such as chest X-rays, echocardiograms, and laboratory tests
  • Collaboration:Collaborate with a multidisciplinary team of healthcare professionals, including surgeons, nurses, and respiratory therapists, to optimize patient care
  • Family Communication:Communicate effectively with patients' families, providing updates on the patient's condition, treatment plan, and prognosis
  • Emergency Response:Respond to medical emergencies within the hospital, particularly in critical care areas
  • Documentation:Maintain accurate and up-to-date medical records, documenting patient assessments, interventions, and outcomes
